codenoobsguide-main.title: CodeNo0b's Guide out of Mediocrity - main
codenoobsguide-main.description: CodeNo0b's Guide out of Mediocrity's overview, table of contents. Much like a map of best practices and pragmatic clean coding.
codenoobsguide-main.keywords: Passionate Programmer, Pragmatic Programmer, Clean Code, Software Design, Software Architecture, Best Practices

codenoobsguide-generalcharacteristics.title: CodeNo0b's Guide out of Mediocrity - General Characteristics
codenoobsguide-generalcharacteristics.description: Here I explore some of the key traits for our ideal best version of our developer self. Keep in mind, this isn't a checklist but a goal.
codenoobsguide-generalcharacteristics.keywords: Inquisitive, Realistic, Specialist, Generalist, Creative, Passionate, Remarkable

2018-chronocross.title: Introducing Chronocross - A Simple Productivity App built on Quasar and Firebase
2018-chronocross.description: What's the best way to explore a new framework? Build something that solves your personal problem. Chronocross is a productivity app, a combination of the Pomodoro Technique and Eisenhower matrix.
2018-chronocross.keywords: Firebase, Vuejs, Vue, Quasar, Pomodoro, Eisenhower, Productivity, Cordova, Mobile App
